eclasstool.model.drawingtools

Class PointNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • eclasstool.model.drawingtools.PointNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class PointNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node
    An inivisible node that is used in the toolbar to draw an edge.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
